name: gutenberg-everywhere
description: Gutenberg in WordPress comments, admin pages, bbPress, and BuddyPress.

scripts.release: yarn build && rm -rf release && mkdir -p release/gutenberg-everywhere && cp -R *.php readme.txt *.png build classes release/gutenberg-everywhere && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 tar --strip-components=1 -cf release/gutenberg-everywhere.tar release/gutenberg-everywhere/*

author: Automattic
